description.text: Craft an Eye of Ender and a NameTag together to create Chakra,
drop your trident on the ground and right click it with the Chakra.
The trident will be endowed with Raijin.

You will recieve 2 Items.
Raijin and Level 1.
Craft an Ender Pearl and Nametag together for spare Raijin items.
